job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: dice is the leading career destination for tech experts at every stage of their careers our client phoenix staff inc is seeking the following apply via dice todayltbrgtltbrgttitle senior software engineer location chandler az were looking to place a senior software development engineer with a cross functional team using the latest development technologies and agile practices this is a great opportunity with a great company with a startup type feel you know inoffice gym casual feel and of course great pay and benefits we are currently looking for of these positions one will be more of a level and one a level your role youll be a magician of product experiences instead of cutting a human in half youll make the technical and complex simple and effortless presto participate in all aspects of the software lifecycle from ideation through development and including production support mentor educate and lead other collaborate deeply with a cross functional team of engineers ux product and operations you will do more than just write code leverage practices such as continuous integration continuous deployment pairing and test driven development to deliver early and often actively engage with the education community to understand product needs apply lean startupagile approaches to software development work in an open space environment no cube walls or fences or slats what youve got years of professional software development experience experience with at least one other modern language multiple strongly preferred eg c python java swift javascript knowledge of app development stack for ios andor android awareness of cross platform development best practices eg mobile first responsive design progressive web applications knowledge of mobile development frameworks eg react native xamarin a plus familiarity with agile methods scrum and xp preferred experience in linux environment windows experience a bonus passion for selfdriven continuous learning both in and out of the office opinionated on technology in theory but flexible in practice involvement with open source projects a plus passion for education is a must experience in edtech helpful but not required passion for passionfruit is a plus have a great day to find more great techcentric jobs please visit wwwphoenixstaffcom
